channel.title: Marketplace on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Marketplace on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Trusted Launch is now supported for Arm64 Marketplace Images
item.description:
Azure Marketplace now offers Arm64 images that support Trusted Launch, enabling customers to run Arm64 virtual machines with Trusted Launch security features. This combines Arm64 cost and performance efficiencies with the integrity and protection benefits of Trusted Launch.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: security: The new Microsoft Security Store unites partners andÂ innovation
item.description:
Microsoft announced the new Microsoft Security Store, a centralized gateway that helps customers discover, purchase, and deploy vetted security solutions and AI agents from leading partners, aiming to simplify procurement and accelerate partner-driven innovation.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog
